thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Highlight Communications: Holds 38.44% Of Share Capital And Voting Rights Of Constantin Medien

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Highlight Communications: Holds 38.44% Of Share Capital And Voting Rights Of Constantin Medien
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - HIGHLIGHT COMMUNICATIONS AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: NOTIFICATION PURSUANT TO SECTION 23 PARA. 1 SENTENCE 1 NO. 2 OF THE GERMAN SECURITIES ACQUISITION AND TAKEOVER ACT
* UNTIL 17 JANUARY 2018 TAKEOVER OFFER HAS BEEN ACCEPTED FOR 35,978,738 CONSTANTIN SHARES
* THIS CORRESPONDS TO APPROX 38.44% OF SHARE CAPITAL AND VOTING RIGHTS OF CONSTANTIN MEDIEN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
